message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $110 is a bit high for me.  Would you be willing to come down to $90?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to sell it to you for $105.
I'm getting closer to what I can afford, Alice. How about $95?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell it to you for $100, which is the lowest price I can go.
